VAS – RITA RATNAM – Beloved wife of the late X.M. Vas,​ cherished mother of Juliana (Dharshini),​ Roshan (USA),​ Antoinette (Raji),​ (Canada) and Dr Angela (SBSCH – Peradeniya),​ loving mother-in-law of Angela (USA),​ Pootharan (Canada) and Dr Ajith Gunasingha,​ precious grandmother of Dylan (USA),​ Sanjeewa (USA),​ Jessica (Canada),​ Pranisha (Canada) and Gayasha (Canada),​ eldest daughter of the late Mr & Mrs V.X.B. Fernando,​ loving sister of Rt. Rev. Dr Emmanuel Fernando (Bishop of Mannar),​ Rev. Sr. M. Dilecta AC,​ John Fernando,​ Micheline Victoria and of the late Rev. Fr. Joe Fernando (Diocese of Jaffna),​ the late Rev. Sr. M. Joella AC and the late Anton Fernando. Remains lie at the Jayaratne Funeral Parlour for viewing from the 14th March from 3.00 p.m. to 10.00 p.m. and 15th March from 8.30 am. to 9.00 p.m. Cortege will leave to St. Anthony’s Cathedral,​ Kandy on 16th March and will lie in the Cathedral for viewing from 12.30 p.m. to 3.00 p.m. After a service at 3.00 p.m.,​ the burial will take place at Mahaiyawa Cemetery in Kandy.
